title: Effects of attributions and confirmation bias

content.prompt: Given the information in this scenario, which of the following future behaviors from Brayden will Maggie be most likely to remember?

choices.label: Brayden does well on his next chemistry test.
Brayden does well on an exam in a different class.
Brayden slips on the ice walking to class.
Brayden helps a classmate find a room on campus.

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
